answers.answer:
Tulislah 5 pemberitahuan berdasarkan gambar

Gambar 1 : Library (Perpustakaan)

1. Keep Silent

2. Do not steal

3. Do not sleep inside the library

4. Do not use cellphones in the library

5. No pet allowed

Gambar 2 : School (Sekolah)

1. Do not be late

2. No cellphone inside the classroom

3. Do not interrupt

4. Do not sleep inside the classroom

5. Do not talk to much
